title: Did Adrian Martinez make the right move?
text:
Adrian Martinez started out his collegiate football career at the University of Nebraska before making the move to Kansas State in his senior year.


Code
library(tidyverse)
library(patchwork)


Warning: package 'patchwork' was built under R version 4.4.2


Code
library(waffle)


Warning: package 'waffle' was built under R version 4.4.2


Code
library(ggrepel)




Code
m22 <- read_csv("data/martinez2022.csv")


New names:
Rows: 11 Columns: 21
── Column specification
──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── Delimiter: "," chr
(5): Date, School, ...4, Opponent, ...6 dbl (16): Rk, PassCmp, PassAtt,
PassPct, PassYds, PassTD, PassInt, PassRate,...

Code

New names:
Rows: 12 Columns: 17
── Column specification
──────────────────────────────────────────────────────── Delimiter: "," chr
(5): Date, School, ...4, Opponent, ...6 dbl (12): Rk, PassCmp, PassAtt,
PassPct, PassYds, PassTD, PassInt, PassRate,...

Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.

Code
nu <- read_csv("data/nebraska2022.csv")


Rows: 3 Columns: 23
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr  (1): Split
dbl (22): G, PassCmp, PassAtt, PassPct, PassYds, PassTD, RushAtt, RushYds, R...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.


Code
kst <- read_csv("data/kstate2022.csv")


Rows: 3 Columns: 23
── Column specification ────────────────────────────────────────────────────────
Delimiter: ","
chr  (1): Split
dbl (22): G, PassCmp, PassAtt, PassPct, PassYds, PassTD, RushAtt, RushYds, R...

ℹ Use `spec()` to retrieve the full column specification for this data.
ℹ Specify the column types or set `show_col_types = FALSE` to quiet this message.


Code
passing <- ggplot() +
  geom_line(data=m22, aes(x=Rk, y=PassAtt), color="purple") +
  geom_line(data=m21, aes(x=Rk, y=PassAtt), color = "red") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-1, 40)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1:11, labels = paste( 1:11)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    x = "Week", y = "Pass Completion Percentage",
    title = "Martinez threw the ball better at Nebraska",
    subtitle = "His passes were more consistent prior to moving to the Big 12",
    caption = "By: Krystin Collins | Source: https://www.sports-reference.com/cfb/players/adrian-martinez-2.html"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 10),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 10),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  )

rushing <- ggplot() +
  geom_line(data=m22, aes(x=Rk, y=RushAvg), color="purple") +
  geom_line(data=m21, aes(x=Rk, y=RushAvg), color = "red") +
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-3, 20)) +
  scale_x_continuous(breaks = 1:11, labels = paste( 1:11)) +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(
    x = "Week", y = "Rushing Average Yards",
    title = "Martinez ran farther while in the Big 12",
    subtitle = "He ran for more yards each plan when he was a Wildcat",
    caption = "By: Krystin Collins | Source: https://www.sports-reference.com/cfb/players/adrian-martinez-2.html"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(
    plot.title = element_text(size = 16, face = "bold"),
    plot.subtitle = element_text(size = 10),
    axis.title = element_text(size = 10),
    panel.grid.minor = element_blank()
  )

title: About
text: Hi! My name is Krystin Collins and I am currently a senior at the University of Nebraska-Lincoln. I am double majoring in broadcasting and sports media and communications with a minor in hospitality, restaurant and tourism management. I am currently an intern at HuskerVision. I hope to tell compelling stories through the use of sports data.
